name: CVE-2020-11656
description: In SQLite through 3.31.1, the ALTER TABLE implementation has a use-after-free, as demonstrated by an ORDER BY clause that belongs to a compound SELECT statement.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:sqlite:sqlite:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:netapp:ontap_select_deploy_administration_utility:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:outside_in_technology:8.5.4:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:outside_in_technology:8.5.5:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:hyperion_infrastructure_technology:11.1.2.4:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:enterprise_manager_ops_center:12.4.0.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:mysql:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:communications_network_charging_and_control:12.0.2:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:communications_network_charging_and_control:6.0.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:communications_network_charging_and_control:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:zfs_storage_appliance_kit:8.8:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:oracle:mysql_workbench:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:oracle:communications_messaging_server:8.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:siemens:sinec_infrastructure_network_services:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:tenable:tenable.sc:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')]
